gen.success: scoured for loot like a professional treasure hunter and found this impressive haul.
gen.fail: tried as hard as they could, but they found nothing worth taking.

gen.success: found a hidden cache and grabbed all of its contents. Like taking candy from a baby.
gen.fail: stumbled across a good stash, but was chased off by its owner for trying to steal it.

gen.success: spotted something interesting from afar, and upon closer inspection it turned out to be this.
gen.fail: thought they saw something good, but it wasn't worth it when they saw it up close.

one.success: found this under the soot and sand and carefully dusted it off. It's still warm to the touch.
one.fail: picked something up, but it crumbled to ash in their grasp.

one.success: saw a glimmer in the flames, and reached into the sweltering heat to retrieve this.
one.fail: stuck their paw into the fire trying to grab something, and got burned for their troubles.

two.success: fished up lots of weeds and mud, but it all payed off when they finally found this.
two.fail: reeled in a soggy boot. You probably wouldn't want that, so they tossed it back in.

two.success: channeled their inner pirate and plundered all this booty. Yo ho, yo ho, a pirate's life for me!
two.fail: wasn't able to find anything good. Alas, when you look at water everything is shiny.

three.success: excavated this treasure with precision and dexterity, a budding archeologist.
three.fail: tried to extract something gently, but accidentally smashed a hole through it.

three.success: dug up many bits and bobs, proving the existence of ancient civilizations. Oh, they also found this.
three.fail: fell into an open dig site, messing up the excavation in progress.
